Software Vendor

CodeCrux offers software vendor as service (SVAS) for technology companies and business companies, CodeCrux provides tech help to the companies to improve business process experience and global reach.
We help software companies to address their most pressing needs, such as migrating to SaaS business models, speeding development cycles etc.
